import Title from './components/Title'; import Carousel from './components/Carousel'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min'; import Genres from './components/Genres'; import UserInfo from './components/UserInfo'; import FormInputs from './components/FormInputs'; import { FormProvider } from './context/FormContext'; function App() { return (
</Route> <Route exact path="/get-started"> <FormProvider> <FormInputs /> </FormProvider> </Route> <Route exact path="/choose-genres"> <FormProvider> <FormInputs /> </FormProvider> </Route> <Route exact path="/recommendations"> <Recommendations /> </Route> <Route exact path="/final-recommendations"> <FinalRecommendations /> </Route> </Switch> <div className="bottom"> <Carousel /> <Carousel /> </div> </div> </div> </Router> ); } export default App;
